content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
- Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)

### Iron plate factory at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0) 
- Furnace (position 45.0, -83.0)
- Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0)
- Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0)
- Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0)

### Lab at position (2.5, 0.5)
Consists of lab (position 2.5, 0.5) and inserter (position 3.5, 0.5)

### Storage at position (43.5, -82.5)
Consists of chest (position 43.5, -82.5)
- Chest (position 40.5, -80.5)
- Chest (position 43.5, -81.5)
- Chest (position 2.5, 0.5)
- Chest (position 0.5, 2.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have sufficient fuel before using them
### Errors when using furnace entities but having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnace entities have the required ingredients to smelt before using them
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
- Ensure that the steam engine has the required input liquid before using it
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the offshore pump has the required fluid present in connections before using it
### Errors when using lab but having no power
- Ensure that the lab has the required power before using it
